laboratory_examinations.findings: Mosaic karyotype (45XY,der(15)?t(15;21),-21 [1]/46,XY [2]); normal chromosomal karyotypes of the parents.
Deletion of 22.7 Mb in chr15q11.2q21.1 and a 2.1 Mb deletion in chr21q22.3 with a copy number of about 1.5.
Copy number of the 15q11-q13 region ranged between 0.5–0.7 (normal value 0.7–1.3), indicating presence of gene deletion mutation.
Methylation level of approximately 70% (normal value 50%), indicating partial deletion of the methylated paternal allele.
